cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4.1)

message(WARNING "########make libsilk-lib ################")

project("silk-lib")

set(silk_public_HEADERS
        ./../../silk/interface/SKP_Silk_control.h
        ./../../silk/interface/SKP_Silk_errors.h
        ./../../silk/interface/SKP_Silk_SDK_API.h
        ./../../silk/interface/SKP_Silk_typedef.h
        )

set(INCLUDE_DIR
        ./../../silk/interface
        ./../../silk/src
)

set(silk_SOURCES
        ${silk_c_SOURCES}
        ${silk_arm_SOURCES}
        )

add_definitions(-DNO_ASM)

include_directories(${INCLUDE_DIR})

add_library(silk STATIC ${silk_SOURCES})
